title: Do private bankers make a lot of money? - Quora
tags: Jobs and Careers in Consumer Banking
Salaries for Specific Jobs and Careers

response.answer_text: We can't say that all private bankers are making money because some bankers are giving their best services to customers. Tereza Burki is one of them which offers private banking to get the best from your investment. But when a private banker has good knowledge then that knowledge can provide them lots of money.

It depends on which private banker. In case of countries with a traditional private banker sector, I think they make a lot of money. Because it is hard to became private banker, so of course they can make and earn a lot of money with their knowledge.
